mapper.select: SELECT A.CATE FROM TBO_DEDUCTION_LIST A WHERE A.GBN = #{gbn} GROUP BY A.CATE

SELECT TB.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.DEDUCTION_DE ASC) AS RN , A.NO , A.GBN , A.CATE , A.AMOUNT , FORMAT(A.AMOUNT, 0) AS AMOUNT_VW , A.BIGO , A.DEDUCTION_DE , DATE_FORMAT(A.DEDUCTION_DE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS DEDUCTION_DE_VW , A.REGIST_ID , A.REGIST_DATE , A.UPDT_ID , A.UPDT_DATE FROM TBO_DEDUCTION_LIST A WHERE 1=1 AND A.GBN = #{gbn} AND A.DEDUCTION_DE LIKE CONCAT(#{searchYYYYMM}, '%') ORDER BY A.DEDUCTION_DE ASC ) TB ORDER BY RN DESC

SELECT A.CATE , SUM(A.AMOUNT) AS CATE_AMOUNT , FORMAT(SUM(A.AMOUNT), 0) AS CATE_AMOUNT_VW , ROUND( SUM(A.AMOUNT) / (SELECT SUM(k.AMOUNT) FROM TBO_DEDUCTION_LIST k WHERE k.GBN = #{gbn} AND k.DEDUCTION_DE LIKE CONCAT(#{searchYYYYMM}, '%')) *100, 2) AS CATE_STAT FROM TBO_DEDUCTION_LIST A WHERE 1=1 AND A.GBN = #{gbn} AND A.DEDUCTION_DE LIKE CONCAT(#{searchYYYYMM}, '%') GROUP BY A.CATE ORDER BY 2 DESC

SELECT FORMAT(SUM(A.AMOUNT), 0) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT , FORMAT(#{gbn}, 0) AS GBN , FORMAT(#{gbn} - SUM(A.AMOUNT), 0) AS BALANCE , ROUND(SUM(A.AMOUNT)/#{gbn}*100, 2) AS TOTAL_PERCENT , COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM TBO_DEDUCTION_LIST A WHERE 1=1 AND A.GBN = #{gbn} AND A.DEDUCTION_DE LIKE CONCAT(#{searchYYYYMM}, '%') ORDER BY A.DEDUCTION_DE DESC
